body: mutation {updatemerchantprovider (merchantprovider:{id:"74da1e97-a12c-461e-a09f-d7d8b07c7934", name:"test2", enabled:false, allow_prepaid:false, accepted_payment_methods:["American Express"], processing:{ monthly_cap: 35000, discount_rate: 0.2, transaction_fee: 0.12, reserve_rate: 0.23, maximum_chargeback_ratio: 0.45, transaction_counts: { daily:18, weekly:50, monthly:200 } }, processor:{ name:"NMA" }, gateway:{ name:"NMI", type:"NMI", username:"test2", password:"test23123123", processor_id:"123", }, customer_service:{ email:"customerservice.isnt.great@dot.com", url:"http://dot.com/whatever/forwardslash", description:"Dot com dot com", phone:"1234567890", } } ) { id, name, processor { name }, processing { monthly_cap, discount_rate, transaction_fee, reserve_rate, maximum_chargeback_ratio, transaction_counts { daily, weekly, monthly } }, enabled, gateway { ... on NMI { name, username, password, processor_id } ... on Innovio { name, username, password, product_id } ... on TestMerchantProvider { name } ... on Stripe {name, api_key} }, allow_prepaid, accepted_payment_methods, customer_service { email, url, description, phone }, created_at, updated_at } }
